channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: White House tells agencies to draft mass firing plans ahead of potential shutdown
item.description: The White House is telling agencies to prepare large-scale firings of federal workers if the government shuts down next week.

item.title: Trump DOJ Courting Chaos in Effort to Install New Virginia U.S. Attorney

item.title: Report: Club Flyer Celebrating Charlie Kirk’s Assassination Found At Georgetown University Campus
item.description: The posted flyer reads, 'Hey, Fascist! Catch! The only political group that celebrates when Nazis die.'

item.title: The Left Accuses The Right Of Hate To Avoid Debate And Silence Opposition
item.description: Conservatives' views on marriage, transgenderism, abortion, race, and more are based on reason, science, economics, and the Bible — not hate.

item.title: Putin Is Sure to Test Trump’s Ukraine Turnabout
item.description: The president’s tough talk is a challenge to the Kremlin.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel, Unrepentant Liar
item.description: Kimmel’s return suggests that he has learned nothing and will do it again.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Movement Will Not Die with Him
item.description: We must use this moment to fight for lasting change, especially by changing the culture of higher education.

item.title: More Evidence Needed for Trump Administration’s Tylenol Warning
item.description: Americans could be forgiven for waiting to see more data before emptying out their medicine cabinets.

item.title: Justice Department trying to indict former FBI Director James Comey by next week
item.description: Federal prosecutors are trying to indict former FBI Director James Comey before the statute of limitations runs out next week for perjury charges.
